name: WhatsApp Travel Agent
description: Add a WhatsApp button that connects visitors directly to your travel agency. Perfect for travel agencies, tour operators, and hospitality businesses looking to provide instant customer service and travel booking assistance!

settings.content:
🌴 [Your Travel Agency Name] 🌊
Your Trusted Adventure Partner!

Hello Traveler! 👋

Ready to explore breathtaking destinations with hassle-free travel experiences? 🚀

We're a team of passionate travelers – "By Travelers, For Travelers" – offering handcrafted tour packages designed to bring your dream vacation to life!

✨ YOUR TOUR OPTIONS:

🏖️ Beach Getaway Package: Snorkeling, sunset tours & fresh seafood feasts.

🌿 Mangrove Forest Adventure: Eco-tours + local culinary delights.

⛰️ Mountain & Waterfall Trek: Scenic hikes with jaw-dropping views.

🛥️ Private Boat Excursion: Discover hidden gems with VIP treatment!

💡 WHY CHOOSE US?
✅ Local Experts – Experienced guides who know the secrets.
✅ Affordable – No hidden fees, just honest pricing.
✅ Flexible – Customizable itineraries for your needs.
✅ Rave Reviews – See what fellow travelers say! [Testimonial Link]

📍 CONTACT US:
📞 WA: [Your WhatsApp Number]
🌐 Website: [Your Website Link]
📸 Instagram: @[Your Handle]

📅 Plan your adventure today! Explore full details here: [Brochure Link]
Or simply message us with your preferred package. Let's make memories! ✈️
